release.action: Respect sign for float. Fix issue: https://jvyaml.dev.java.net/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=13 (2008-10-28)
Binary data is represented as ByteBuffer (2008-10-27)

When parsed, a timestamp in the canonical form (i.e, 2001-12-15T02:59:43.1Z) is interpreted as if it is in the default time zone. Fix issue: https://jvyaml.dev.java.net/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=7 (2008-10-27)
Add Mark from PyYAML. It is not used yet. The JUnit test is migrated from PyYAML (2008-10-23)
Apply SnakeYAML as the name of the library (2008-10-22)
Apply LICENSE info to source files (2008-10-22)
Mavenize project. Apply standard Maven folder structure (2008-10-20)
